enchantmentcompat.config.title: Enchantment Compatibility Config
enchantmentcompat.config.notInWorld.1: Enchantment Compatibility is configurable on a per-world/save basis.
enchantmentcompat.config.notInWorld.2: Please join a world to use the configuration screen!
enchantmentcompat.modEnabled.label: Mod enabled
enchantmentcompat.bows.label: Allow bow enchantments (i.e. infinity, mending) to combine
enchantmentcompat.crossbows.label: Allow crossbow enchantments (i.e. multishot, piercing) to combine
enchantmentcompat.armor.label: Allow armor enchantments (i.e. X protection) to combine
enchantmentcompat.damage.label: Allow damage enchantments (i.e. sharpness, smite) to combine
